Recipe.title: Scrambled Eggs
Recipe.Description: Eggs for breakfast is a standard staple. But if they are not done right, they end up a rubbery or burnt mess.

section.instruction: Break Eggs into a cup. (Make sure any shell pieces are removed.)
Using a fork, or small whisk, stir the Egg until it is thoroughly blended.
Place a small skillet on the stove set to medium heat.
Using a Spatula, continuously scrape cooked Egg from bottom of skillet, and turn it over, until all Egg is cooked.
Sprinkle with Salt and Pepper to taste.

Notes.note: The Milk adds something to the Eggs which will boil, which causes the Eggs to be fluffy.

Modifications.modification: If you are not using a non-stick pan, consider using some non-stick spray. (such as Pam).
